DOC.brief_title: Utilization Ticagrelor Upstream Setting Non-ST-Segment Elevation Myocardial Infarction ( UPSTREAM ) : An ED-Based Clinical Registry
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase IV , post-approval , multicenter , prospective , noninterventional study consecutive patient work diagnosis NSTEMI ( Non-ST-Elevation Myocardial Infarction ) treatment OAP ( Oral Anti-Platelet ) agent ( ticagrelor , clopidogrel , prasugrel ) either ED ( Emergency Department ) , case within timeframe emergency physicians consider `` upstream '' - i.e. , within first 72 hour ED arrival least 4 hour diagnostic angiography . This registry design address data gap regard course NSTEMI ED arrival diagnostic angiography detail , characterize follow ED peri-ED use advance OAP agent . Demographic , ischemic v bleed risk stratification [ calculate retrospectively GRACE ( Global Registry Acute Coronary Events ) , TIMI ( Thrombolysis Myocardial Infarction ) , PURSUIT ( Platelet glycoprotein IIb/IIIa Unstable angina : Receptor Suppression Using Integrilin ) score , CRUSADE ( Can Rapid risk stratification Unstable angina patient Suppress ADverse outcomes Early implementation ACC/AHA guideline ) Bleeding Score , respectively ] , OAP agent data ( include , discernible , rationale agent selection ) collect UPSTREAM patient , regardless OAP therapy , discharge . Risk factor , angiography result , intervention/s ( ) , post-catheterization care , discharge regimen , in-hospital outcome record . Patients treat upstream , in-hospital , discharge home ticagrelor , follow , telephone and/or chart review ( necessary element include chart accessible investigator ) , 30 ( +10 ) day post-discharge , evaluation data element collect include patient-reported compliance visit medication , patient-reported healthcare resource utilization , pertinent event complication . Patients treat upstream , in-hospital , discharge home different OAP therapy ( clopidogrel prasugrel ) follow beyond data collection complete hospital discharge . It expect relatively small number patient change therapy ticagrelor another OAP agent discharge prior 30 day post-discharge , though change query 30-day call/chart review .
